title: League crash when i go to loading screen and cant join back
body: I went to play ranked last night and the game crashed with error 0xc0000005 so i repaired my client and tried to reconnect and my team had done a remake so i went down to 0 lp and got low priority que so i didn't feel like playing anymore last night. I waited the low priority que time and got into a ranked game again and when loading in i got the same error and found out it was avg about 3 mins after so i disabled it loaded into the game and it got remade right when i got back in, now im in s4 75 lp and have 2 leaves... riot please fix your patches and at least put a bigger message on league saying avg crashes this patch instead of making people have to find one response to a forum post. Please fix...

replies.body:
We're in no way able to control what AVG or other Antivirus applications will flag as *malicious* inside of the patches. Antivirus or Firewall programs can potentially cause issues with any application that patches files frequently, so it's a good idea to add exceptions for League or disable your firewall while playing League if you continue to have issues. Some security applications even offer a **gaming mode** to avoid causing these types of issues.

Let me know if you have any other questions.
